title: [Original Art] Alien Hunter Lucian
body:
[Update]
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0iLVBwqq-update-alien-hunter-lucian-skin

http://tonychopper23.deviantart.com/art/TonyYin-Lucian-DA-487384391?ga_submit_new=10%253A1412876373

Hello everyone! It's Tony again. This time I got a little fan art/ skin design sketch for you! It's Alien hunter Lucian, or space ranger Lucian, haven't decided yet haha
Please let me know what you think! It would be awesome to hear your feedback! 
I will draw the whole body if you like it!

replies.body: This is terrific! Hoping to see more works in the future from you :D

Hello! I have made an update to this! 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0iLVBwqq-update-alien-hunter-lucian-skin
Please check it out and let me know what you think!

This is amazing. Thank you for sharing this with us :D

RIOT PLS.

Hello Raasu! :D
I have an update for this skin! Please check it out!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0iLVBwqq-update-alien-hunter-lucian-skin
Kha'zix players beware, Lucian isn't just hunting Thresh anymore...
You mean void players, Kha'zix isn't the only alien on the rift. :B

The following champions should run!
{{champion:31}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:38}}

But Kha'Zix is the easiest out of those bugs to squash! xD 

{{item:3175}} {{item:3175}} {{item:3175}} {{item:3175}} {{item:3175}} {{item:3175}}

Hello! I have made an update to this!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0iLVBwqq-update-alien-hunter-lucian-skin 
Please check it out and let me know what you think!
NOT BAD! :D like the look of it......(would be funny if he went men in black style too xD)
thanks! hahahaha MIB Lucian would be funny XD almost like debonair Lucian
Hmm pulse fire Lucian maybe?
^or that XD

Hello! I have made an update to this!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0iLVBwqq-update-alien-hunter-lucian-skin 
Please check it out and let me know what you think!

yes
Yes
YES

thank you 
thank you
thank you

Seriously though, if there was to be a new skin for Lucian(at last) then I DEFINITELY would love to see you idea used for such a skin. Great job on the colors btw :)

Also I'm not sure if you meant to do have it that way but I think the gun is a bit lacking on the "detailed" side and could use some added shapes and values in it. Some shading retouches as well as more lines added into the design would also help improve the overall image.

Hope you find the feedback useful. <('O'<)
YES! Definitely! My step would be to design some awesome looking guns to go with the body! :D you are absolutely right XD
This is insane. I hope that Riot sees this. Nice idea.
Thanks Rew711 XD I want a new Lucian skin so badly XD the soccer one just don't do it for me XD
Who should be Lucian's target as "Alien Hunter"? I was thinking Garen, Graves, Tryndamere, Udyr, or Zed. To resemble "the other guy".

> Who should be Lucian's target as "Alien Hunter"? I was thinking Garen, Graves, Tryndamere, Udyr, or Zed. To resemble "the other guy".

cho'gath

Hello Rew711! I have an update on this skin design. Please check it out!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0iLVBwqq-update-alien-hunter-lucian-skin

i dont like it. there are better ideas like officer lucian or debonair lucian or mecha lucian. i dont know why everyone is all kisses on the OP just because he made a picture lol. no hate dude, but dont like the idea or the picture.

good try though
I understand. We all like different things. Officer Lucian or Debonair lucian sounds pretty awesome!
sick but kinda looks like a chick
if this does happen its proably gonna be renamed headhunter lucian or something like that, just because it fits the whole futuristic theme
Wicked O_O
Thank you LeoHark! :D
If **RIOT** doesn't make a skin out of this, i would really question why. **RIOT** PLS {{champion:236}}
thank you! XD it would be amazing if it happens :)

Hello! I have made an update to this!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0iLVBwqq-update-alien-hunter-lucian-skin 
Please check it out and let me know what you think!
I love this skin- it'd go well with the Headhunter skins.
thank you! :D yes It would!
just in time for ALIEN: Isolation too XD
hahaha perfect timing XD
haha thana you XD
How about a full face mask? Alien hunters would travel through space right so how does he breathe. Sorta like this http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2010/090/c/0/Recon_by_Shrinking_Universe.jpg
this is a greta idea! :D I might do some redesigns to incorporate that XD
this is so awesome. Ben wanting a legit Lucian skin for a while!!!
thanks! me too! :D soccer lucian just doesn't do it for me
Is this because of alien isolation?
haha didn't know about Alien Isolation until just now XD what a coincidence!
I have never owned or played Lucian but if this skin happened I would in a heartbeat.  Fantastic work, creativity and idea.  Love it! :)  And deserves a {{item:2052}}
haha thank you Vexiah! XD
I had a similar concept for a skin that Diana really badly needs.
Project Lucian? Pretty cool :3
haha yup :) thank you~
It is an amazing idea!
